name: Glyphs Apprentice
description: Glyphs Apprentice is a deeply engrossing problem solving game, using simple programming to animate game objects. There are over 70 levels, each with a near infinite number of solutions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video RAM, 810MHz Graphics Clock Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: None required.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer. Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video RAM, 1.2GHz Graphics Clock or higher. Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: None required.
